---
name: Bug report
about: Report something that is not working in the mod
title: ''
labels: new bug
assignees: ''

---

This is the repository of Hyxcate exclusively for 1.12.2 and is not affiliated with Nyx and its other forks. Please do not report any bugs originating from these projects, they will immediately be closed and marked as invalid.

Make sure that the bug you are reporting happens on the LATEST version of Hyxcate, especially if you are playing on a modpack that hasn't been updated in awhile. It is likely that the bug you are reporting has already been fixed and will count as an invalid issue.
